name: Total Tatar
description:
A top-down view, 2D shooter. 

WASD to move, left click to shoot, shift to dodge/dash. 

Lore: You discovered time machines, and went back in time to kill the tatars in Hungary. 

Petőfi Sándor called them "dog-headed tatars" in one of his works, and it became popular, that's where I was inspired from.

Due to lack of time(management), I had to cut down a lot from the original idea, including any sound or music, sorry for that.
